Uses of Class
org.drasyl.remote.protocol.Nonce

  • Packages that use Nonce 
    Package Description
    org.drasyl.crypto
    Classes for crypto-related operations.
    org.drasyl.remote.protocol
    The protocol used for communication with remote nodes.

    • Uses of Nonce in org.drasyl.crypto

      Methods in org.drasyl.crypto with parameters of type Nonce 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      byte[] Crypto.decrypt​(byte[] cipher, byte[] authTag, Nonce nonce, com.goterl.lazysodium.utils.SessionPair sessionPair)
      Decrypt the given cipher, by verify the authTag as an authentication tag, uses the given nonce and decrypting with the rx part of the sessionPair.
      byte[] Crypto.encrypt​(byte[] message, byte[] authTag, Nonce nonce, com.goterl.lazysodium.utils.SessionPair sessionPair)
      Encrypts the given message, by adding authTag as an authentication tag, using the given (hopefully fresh) nonce and encrypting with the tx part of the sessionPair.

      static Nonce Nonce.of​(String bytes)  
      static Nonce Nonce.randomNonce()
      Static factory to retrieve a randomly generated Nonce.
      Methods in org.drasyl.remote.protocol with parameters of type Nonce 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static RemoteEnvelope<Protocol.Acknowledgement> RemoteEnvelope.acknowledgement​(int networkId, IdentityPublicKey sender, ProofOfWork proofOfWork, IdentityPublicKey recipient, Nonce correspondingId)
      Creates new Protocol.Acknowledgement message (reply to Protocol.Discovery message).
